intro.title: Your Local Mechanic Since 2004
paragraphs: John Mills has been a mechanic for over 20 years, operating as an independent mechanic for the last 11 years. What started as a passion for engines has grown into Maynooth's most trusted independent garage.

At JM Motors, we believe that a high standard of workmanship is the top priority. We have built a reputation in Maynooth and Kildare for honesty, reliability, and technical expertise. We do not just fix cars; we build relationships with our customers based on trust.

We use only the latest technology for our diagnostic systems and only recommended parts to ensure safety and peace of mind. Whether you drive a compact car, a commercial van, or a 4x4, we treat every vehicle with the same level of meticulous care as if it were our own.

visual.cardSubtitle: Finding the root cause, not just the symptom.
visual.promiseText: We promise to provide transparent pricing, honest advice, and quality workmanship on every single job. No hidden fees, no unnecessary repairs.
